std::string webEngine::Task::ToXml ( void   ) 

Converts this object to an XML.

This function realizes alternate serialization mechanism. It generates more compact and simplified XML representation. This representation is used for internal data exchange (for example to store data through iweStorage interface).

Return values:
This object as a std::string.

Implements webEngine::iOptionsProvider.
